dct_title_s: Atlas de la America del Sur
dct_description_sm: Leather binding with decorative gilt trim.
First 4 and last 4 pages blank (included in page description).
Latiduinal and longitudinal lines on charts.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Charts show coastlines, topography, vegetation, drainage, depths, shoals, islands, ports, city plans.
Chart 1 created in London by Espinosa after he left Spain.
Charts 8-15 derive in whole or in part from the Malaspina expedition, 1789-1794.
dct_spatial_sm: Río de la Plata (Argentina and Uruguay)
